Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.annotations

Annotation Interface HalApiInterface

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface HalApiInterface
A marker annotation that is required for all HAL API interfaces to be used with the Rhyme framework. It indicates that the interface can be scanned for the presence of methods annotated with Related, ResourceState, etc that actually define the API.

Note that you can make your interface extend LinkableResource, if the clients of the API should be aware that (and how) the resource can always be accessed through an URI.

If you are also using Rhyme for server-side rendering of the resource, then all your implementations of an interface annotated with HalApiInterface must implement either LinkableResource or EmbeddableResource.

See Also:

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    contentType
    Allows to define a custom content type that is used when rendering server-side resource instances implementing this interface

  • Element Details

    • contentType

      String contentType
      Allows to define a custom content type that is used when rendering server-side resource instances implementing this interface
      Returns:
      the custom content type (or default value of "application/hal+json")
      Default:
      "application/hal+json"
